titleStmt.title: The Earle of Melfort's letter to the Presbyterian-ministers in Scotland writ in His Majesty's name upon their address together with some remarks upon it.
Letter to the Presbyterian-ministers in Scotland
titleStmt.author: Melfort, John Drummond, Earl of, 1649-1715.
Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.

notesStmt.note: Wing number B5781 cancelled in Wing (CD-ROM, 1996); replaced by Wing M1641.
